comment.author: 25695066@N00
comment._content: Published reports spell the Jury Foreman's name in the Carman case as Robert F. Ludlam. query.nytimes.com/gst/abstract.html?res=F40615F63D5C13738... query.nytimes.com/gst/abstract.html?res=F10C12F83F5412738...

comment.author: 35072786@N08
comment._content: TVL 1970:  Thanks for finding the other spelling of  the jury foreman's name.  We will add it to the image description.
